name: AVVideoCompositionInstructionProtocol
desc: A protocol that defines the interface for a video composition instruction.

items.name: var passthroughTrackID: CMPersistentTrackID
items.desc: An identifier of a source track to pass through without compositing.

items.name: var requiredSourceTrackIDs: [NSValue]?
items.desc: The identifiers of the video tracks the instruction requires to compose frames.

items.name: var requiredSourceSampleDataTrackIDs: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The identifiers of the sample data tracks the instruction requires to compose frames.

items.name: var containsTweening: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the composition contains tweening.

items.name: var enablePostProcessing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the composition enables post-processing.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range during which the instruction is effective.
